rooms.name: Entrance Hall
rooms.description: The entrance hall is designed to welcome visitors and guide them into the main areas of the villa while aligning with Vastu principles by positioning it towards the east.

rooms.name: Living Room
rooms.description: An open-plan living area that seamlessly connects to the kitchen. Large windows on the south side allow ample natural light in accordance with Vastu principles.

rooms.name: Open-Plan Kitchen
rooms.description: A Scandinavian-designed kitchen integrated with the living room for a modern and functional space. The layout promotes easy movement between cooking and dining areas.

rooms.name: Master Bedroom
rooms.description: A spacious bedroom with ample natural light. Placed in the north-west direction to ensure privacy and a calming atmosphere as recommended by Vastu.

rooms.name: Guest Bedroom
rooms.description: A comfortable guest bedroom designed with Scandinavian minimalism. The positioning complies with local norms and Vastu principles for harmony.

rooms.name: Dining Area
rooms.description: An integrated dining area within the living space that complements the open-plan design. Its east-west orientation ensures balanced energy flow.

rooms.name: Utility Room
rooms.description: A small utility room for storage and minor services, ensuring unobstructed movement in the main areas.

openings.name: Front Entrance Door
openings.description: The primary entry door located on the east side to enhance positive energy flow as per Vastu.

openings.name: Side Window
openings.description: Large windows placed along the south and west walls for balanced lighting throughout the day.

openings.name: Garage Entrance
openings.description: The garage entrance is strategically positioned on the north side of the plot to adhere to local building norms and maintain a neat layout.

rooms.name: Master Bedroom (Upper)
rooms.description: A larger master bedroom on the first floor designed for comfort and privacy, following Scandinavian aesthetics and Vastu guidelines by placing it in a quiet area.

rooms.name: Guest Bedroom (Upper)
rooms.description: A guest bedroom ensuring privacy on the upper level with subtle Scandinavian design elements and adherence to Vastu principles.

rooms.name: Study/Office
rooms.description: A dedicated study area that maximizes natural light through north-facing windows. The layout supports focused work in a serene environment.

rooms.name: Rooftop Terrace
rooms.description: A spacious rooftop terrace for relaxation and social gatherings. It features Scandinavian-inspired minimalistic design elements, open space, and is aligned with Vastu principles to maximize energy balance.

openings.name: First Floor Balcony
openings.description: Balconies on the master and guest bedrooms providing additional outdoor space while ensuring adherence to building regulations.

openings.name: Staircase
openings.description: A centrally located staircase connecting both floors, designed for safety and ease of movement in compliance with local norms.

building_norms.garage: 2-car garage integrated at the north side
building_norms.vastu_principles: Adhered to ensure positive energy flow and spatial harmony.
